resources.string: Join me in a group video chat with Paddi app available on Google play or download using the link below: \n https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tv.paddi.android
You don\'t have any email client
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Are you sure you want to delete account?
INFO: Paddi app is a simple random group video chat, helping you connect with people worldwide and making new friends.\n\n

HOW IT WORKS: 1. Simply click on the 'Random' button and paddi will join you to an available room .

 Each room has a maximum of 3 participant. Also if no rooms are available paddi will automatically create one and add you to the room. 

 2. You can also create a private room, choosing a unique room name and invite other members to join with that same room name.
For bug reports, suggestions, complaints, inquiries and feedback kindly send us a mail.\n
Message: Try out the new and secure cloud storage

Legal: By signing in with Google Account, I hereby agree to the ‘Paddi’ app terms and conditions 2020.

We collect information such as usage statistics from your use of the app, the creation of your account and any communications with ourselves. \n This information collected includes your personal data such as your name and email address. Any information you choose to provide will be collected via the app.

DEVICE INFORMATION WE COLLECT: \n\n Log information: Information regarding your use of the app on your device is stored including access times, your IP address and how you’ve interacted with our platform. Hardware Information: We collect information about your mobile device used to access our product. This includes: Your operating system and version and network information. Location Information: The app uses location information to provide a better experience this data is stored from your device each time you choose to use location services within the app.

We use information collected from you to improve and protect the Paddi\'s platform and it’s users. \n
User queries and discussion We may also use information about you when: \n - Responding to your comments, questions and requests regarding the services provided by Paddi. - Send you information, updates and support with your permission - Communicate with you about products, services and information offered by us.

3. SHARING INFORMATION: \n\n We do not share any of your information without your consent. This information may be used to improve the platform but will not be sent to any third-party service providers. The product may implement sharing features across social media platforms and services. The services use of this information will be governed by their own privacy policies and conditions.

4. SECURITY: \n\n We are concerned with the security of all transactions made within our app that is why our payment platform are encrypted for safe transactions and card details are not saved, shared or revealed to any third party before or after any payment.

5. YOUR CHOICES: 

 We would like to remind the user that the way they use the platform must adhere to our use policies and that you may be liable for any misconduct. If you do not wish to adhere to the policies outlined in this documentation. Email stackdriveinc@gmail.com to deactivate your account. These policies are subject to status and may be changed in the future when this occurs the app will be updated with the changes outlined. 


USE POLICES: 

 Any unlawful use of the app will be notified to local police services to be further investigated. Your personal information and service data will be given. We may modify, suspend or terminate your account if, in our sole discretion we decide that you have violated the policies or guidelines that are part of this agreement, or to protect the platform and its users. Any fees or payments made to the platform currently (or in the future) are paid by you the user and any queries regarding payments will be handled individually depending on outlined circumstances.
THIRD PARTY LIBRARY LICENSES APPRECIATION: \n\n Special thanks goes to these free and/or open-source software libraries (FOSS) used in production of ‘Paddi’ app Android.
